title: FS: Lot Of 2 PSA 4 T206's Incredible Color!! SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: Lot Of 2 PSA 4 T206's Incredible Color!! SOLD
posts.post_content:
Jimmy Dygert & Happy Smith. The colors are among the nicest I've seen. There is a little wrinkle/crease just below the waist on the left side of Happy. The price is SOLD delivered for both PP/FF please. Thank you for looking.

Joe K
